lead_paragraph: In a split second, Chris Froome's hopes of claiming a third Tour de France title hung in the balance.

headline.print_headline: Froome Survives Tour Crash Relatively Unscathed
headline.main: Froome Survives Tour Crash Relatively Unscathed
